alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Passaic and northern Bergen Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawthorne, or near Pompton Lakes, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ridgewood around 250 PM EDT. Paramus around 255 PM EDT. Ramsey around 300 PM EDT. Oradell around 310 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic
